subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For most of his 12 seasons in Minneapolis, Kevin Garnett was a one-man show, and a lonely, frustrated one at that. He carried the Timberwolves as far as he could, usually to a first-round playoff exit, then spent his summers pining for help.
snippet: For most of his 12 seasons in Minneapolis, Kevin Garnett was a one-man show, and a lonely, frustrated one at that. He carried the Timberwolves as far as he could, usually to a first-round playoff exit, then spent his summers pining for help.
